title: CLDF dataset on Panoan Languages in Standardized Transcription derived from Key and Comrie's "Intercontinental Dictionary Series" from 2023
citation: Miller, J. and List, J.-M. (2024): Providing standardized phonetic transcriptions for the Panoan languages in the Intercontinental Dictionary Series. Computer-Assisted Language Comparison in Practice 7.2. URL: https://calc.hypotheses.org/7503.
